name: Nightmare Side: The Game
description:
Explore the Chilling Legacy of "Nightmare Side"



For over two decades, the "Nightmare Side" radio show has captivated listeners with spine-tingling tales of the supernatural. Originating in the heart of Bandung, Indonesia, since 1997, this iconic show has been the epicenter of ghost stories and paranormal experiences, shared by a devoted audience eager to delve into the mysteries of the unknown.

Now, Step Inside the Nightmare:

In our first-person survival horror game, you have the opportunity to experience the eerie world of "Nightmare Side" like never before. Immerse yourself in the very office where the show's legends were born—Ardan Radio's authentic office, a place notorious for its real-world hauntings and supernatural occurrences.

Key Features:

Interactive Audio Clues



Tune the radio, decipher cryptic messages, and follow eerie voiceovers as you unravel the dark secrets hidden within the haunting broadcasts.

Genuine Atmosphere and Location



Traverse meticulously recreated real-world settings, steeped in authentic lore and an atmosphere of dread that sets the stage for a harrowing journey.

Survival and Stealth Gameplay



Outsmart relentless entities in a chilling game of hide-and-seek, avoiding their relentless pursuit to uncover the darkest of truths.

Mysteries in Text and Exploration



Dive deep into eerie texts and chat logs, solving intricate puzzles and piecing together the chilling narrative that unfolds before you.

Ghost Mediation



Embark on conversations with restless spirits in the unique "Mediation" feature, aimed at bringing peace to the supernatural entities, adding a new layer to the gameplay experience.
